name: a Friend to the End
description:
Your best friend calls you from the hospital bed and wants you to come by for one last visit. On the way there you revisit the memories you have shared through your 80 years together. Reminiscing about your past triggers a transformation changing you into previous versions of yourself, leading to unexpected hurdles along the way. Will you manage to get to your friend in time? 

Featuring 

  • Recordings from a  professional voice actor
  • The main character from four different parts of life
  •  Live recorded accordion music
  • Puzzles
